title: Pixel 5 Update Expectations for Verizon Customers
content:
Should Verizon carrier customers set their expectations to receive updates on their unlocked Pixel 5 devices a week or two later than everyone else that has an unlocked Pixel 5?

This is two updates now in a row that Verizon carrier customers have to wait to receive the same update everyone else already has.

I would like to set expectations and understand if this is the normal process going forward for anyone using a Pixel 5 with Verizon service.

IMHO, it sucks.

Thanks
